acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased on 1991 February 14.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a letter from John Townsend Trowbridge to Roswell Smith.

did.unittitle: John T. Trowbridge to Roswell Smith 1873 Jan 19

scopecontent.p: [Encloses a photograph "taken expressly for your purpose," requests that if he has no other preference to have the head placed in the care of A.V.P. Anthony for cutting as he thinks Anthony would do a good job and is located conveniently in Boston, and complains that often artists do not learn to look carefully for an author's meaning before attempting to illustrate it]
